name: UIUC Library EAD Tools
short_description: A collection of XSLT and other scripts for dealing with Encoded Archival Description (EAD) Finding Aids, such as transformation into HTML or into Dublin Core (DC) records for use with the Open Archive Initiative Protocol for Metadata Harvesting (OAI-PMH)
